name: Can't Sleep 2 (DGludo)
description:
Game based on Jeff The Killer creepypasta.

You have just arrived home from a long day of work, you are tired and need to sleep. But before that, make sure all the windows are closed for your own good. You might find useful items somewhere in the house.

Controls:  

   WASD - Move

   Mouse - Look

   Shift - Sprint

   Mouse1 - Interact

   F - Flashlight

   Escape - Pause
